sql.query:
SELECT *
FROM allClasses_detail
ORDER BY day_int ASC, startTimeDecimal ASC, instructor_firstname ASC

SELECT enrolments.*, students.firstName, students.lastName, students.dob
FROM enrolments
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = enrolments.student)
WHERE enrolments.isValid = true AND enrolments.classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolments.enrolmentType = 1

SELECT enrolments.*, students.firstName, students.lastName, students.dob
FROM enrolments
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = enrolments.student)
WHERE enrolments.isValid = true AND enrolments.classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolments.enrolmentType = 3

SELECT enrolments.*, students.firstName, students.lastName, students.dob
FROM enrolments
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = enrolments.student)
WHERE enrolments.isValid = true AND enrolments.classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolments.enrolmentType = 2

SELECT enrolments.*, students.firstName, students.lastName, students.dob
FROM enrolments
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = enrolments.student)
WHERE enrolments.isValid = true AND enrolments.classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolments.enrolmentType = 4

SELECT enrolments.*, students.firstName, students.lastName, students.dob
FROM enrolments
INNER JOIN students ON (students.id = enrolments.student)
WHERE enrolments.isValid = true AND enrolments.classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolments.enrolmentType = 5

SELECT *
FROM classesDetailView
WHERE (dayId IN ({{$_GET.days.split(",")}})) AND (startDec IN ({{$_GET.times.split(",")}})) AND (levelId IN ({{$_GET.levels.split(",")}})) AND (instructorId IN ({{$_GET.instructors.split(",")}}))
ORDER BY dayId ASC, startDec ASC, instructor ASC, level ASC

SELECT *
FROM enrolments
WHERE isValid = true AND classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolmentType = 1

SELECT *
FROM enrolments
WHERE isValid = true AND classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolmentType = 2

SELECT *
FROM enrolments
WHERE isValid = true AND classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolmentType = 3

SELECT *
FROM enrolments
WHERE isValid = true AND classId = :P1 /* {{id}} */ AND enrolmentType = 4
